name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Twice-Squeezed Eggplant
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on eggplant. —Ed Levine...
recipeIngredient: 1 Japanese eggplant, sliced very thinly lengthwise

recipeInstructions.text: Heavily salt the eggplant; let sit on paper towels at least 30 minutes. Squeeze out liquid; rinse well.
Sauté eggplant in olive oil until tender. Drain on paper towels. Squeeze again to extract oil.
In same pan, briefly sauté garlic. Add tomato wedges and a couple pinches oregano. Cook until tomatoes are soft; add eggplant and reheat.
